name: Albany Taco Fest 2025
description: Celebrate the best tacos from local vendors in the Capital Region. Enjoy live music, craft beers, and family-friendly activities.

name: Live Jazz Night at Villa Di Como Ristorante
venue: Villa Di Como Ristorante, Albany, NY
description: Experience an intimate evening of live jazz with local musicians while enjoying authentic Italian cuisine at this beloved Albany spot.

name: Albany Latin Music Festival
description: A vibrant celebration of Latin music and culture with live bands, dance performances, and food vendors offering Latin-inspired dishes.

name: Opening Celebration: Fusion Bistro
description: Grand opening of Fusion Bistro, a new spot blending Asian and Latin flavors. Enjoy special tasting menus and live acoustic music.

name: Albany Riverfront Blues Festival
description: A weekend of soulful blues performances by regional and national artists along the Hudson River. Food trucks and craft vendors on site.

name: Taco Tuesday at Toro Cantina
description: Weekly Taco Tuesday featuring creative taco specials and margarita deals at this popular local Mexican eatery.

name: Capital Region Food Truck Festival
description: Sample diverse cuisines from the region's top food trucks, including unique fusion dishes and classic comfort foods.

name: Live Indie Rock at The Hollow Bar + Kitchen
venue: The Hollow Bar + Kitchen, Albany, NY
description: Catch rising local indie rock bands at this trendy venue known for its craft cocktails and eclectic menu.

name: Salsa Night at Cafe Capriccio
description: Dance the night away with live salsa music and lessons at this iconic Italian restaurant turned dance spot for the evening.

name: Autumn Harvest Dinner at Yono’s
description: A special seasonal menu featuring Indonesian-inspired dishes with locally sourced ingredients at this fine dining gem.
